Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus heald his wife tightly and close.

Rodimus: Calm yourself. You're ok and thats what matters. New Decepticons, hunting for me or the Matrix. Things always seem to return to the past.

Rodimus turns to the doorway.

Rodimus: Kup! I think we need to talk now!

Kup comes back with Elita and her shake.

Kup: I'll assume that Nightlight told you about what happened. We really need to have this briefing.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Elita:
 
 Elita sighed and followed Kup
 
 Nighlight waited until her daugther have left the room and she said 
 while her voice tembled "He comes to kill you..."
 
 Nightlight told ROdimus how the help signal was picked up and how 
 She and the other Pacificus MAximals went to help, that Windlord 
 arrived first and took Kup to their old maximal base. How she left 
 behind the other maximals and how Jhiaxus found her inside her old 
 home, and his comments about the new Decepticons generation, 
 mentioning too that she pretended to be fool in order get some time 
 and let the others arrive for help her or convince the decepticon 
 that she was useless and then he left her alone; after a brief 
 pause, she mentioned that Jhiaxus asked abour Rodimus's location and 
 how his sudden kind tone started to scared her.
 
 "Then I decided to lie and denied to know where are you... Also I 
 didnt tell him who was me... I couldn't warn you" said softly the 
 femme.
 
 In few words, Nighlight mention that Jhiaxus have told something 
 about the matrix. After a brief pause, NIghtlight narrated that 
 Jhiaxus started to loose his patient and becomes less kind; but she 
 didnt say about that the Deception Lord have tratened with his 
 weapon, the femme was afraid that Rodimus with anger tried to find 
 Jhiaxus.
 
 "Then after he tought that I dont know nothing about where are 
 you... He shot me... I was able to cover me with my wings... but we 
 started to fight, I was forced to... minutes later Salveo, Windlord 
 and kup arrived... That's all"said the femme
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Rodimus Prime/Kup::::
 > 
 > Rodimus caught onto the gesture.
 > 
 > Rodimus: Kup, could you take Elita to get a energon shake? I 
 believe there is a replicator down the hall a bit.
 > 
 > Kup: Sure, Rodimus. C'mon, lass. I know you want a shake.
 > 
 > Kup leads her down the hall to the replicator.
 > 
 > Rodimus: What is it, Nightlight?
 > 
 > 
 >
